channel.title: Posts on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Academic

item.title: Wait Times at Walt Disney World
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(corrplot) library(caret) library(skimr) library(ModelMetrics) library(janitor) library(broom) meta<-read_csv("metadata.csv") merged_rides<- read_csv("merged_rides_.csv") merged_rides$datetime <- as_datetime(merged_rides$datetime) head(merged_rides) ## # A tibble: 6 x 7 ## datetime toy_story_mania rockin_rollerco… seven_dwarfs ## <dttm> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 2014-05-23 09:14:00 50 30 60 ## 2 2014-05-23 09:15:00 50 30 60 ## 3 2014-05-23 09:27:00 50 30 60 ## 4 2014-05-23 09:29:00 50 30 55 ## 5 2014-05-23 09:37:00 50 30 55 ## 6 2014-05-23 09:40:00 85 30 55 ## # … with 3 more variables: splash_mountain <dbl>, space_earth <dbl>, ## # soarin <dbl> merged_rides %>% gather(key="ride",value="wait_time",-datetime) %>% ggplot(aes(ride, wait_time, group = ride)) + geom_boxplot(colour = "black", fill = "#56B4E9",notch = T) + ylab("Wait time")
